Industries: Android, Events, iOS, Market Research, Meeting Software, Mobile
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Design, Events, Media and Entertainment, Messaging and Telecommunications, Mobile, Platforms, Software
Description: Zwoor.com is an online platform that enables users to develop mobile applications for conferences and corporate events.
Full Description: Zwoor.com was founded on a simple, powerful idea: mobile technology changes how we run events, meetings or product presentation, and how we engage with each other. We want to reinvent what businesses and individuals can do with mobile technology through the Zwoor.com platform, made for a new kind of worker, a new kind of workplace and a new kind of interactions. If you are an Conference or Tradeshow organizer, your event materials Go Mobile in just a few clicks.  Your attendees carry an iPhone, an iPad or an Android smartphone, and they now expect the agenda, the meeting materials, maps, exhibitors and alerts right at their fingertips. Our native apps do not require connectivity all the time, and we know that some of the conference or trade show venues are not built with connectivity in mind. We allow participants to store the data on the mobile device, and synch when connected. Zwoor Survey is a friendly, robust and cost effective survey platform that enables you to gather real insight into your event participants. Be that in a large,10,000 people keynote event with no connectivity, or in a small presentation, we can handle both. Zwoor Survey is a native application (vs. a web app), that allows timed surveys, answers to a challenge quiz for a prize, or just a simple multiple choice survey. We are not dependent on the connectivity in the venue – we know that some of the spots are without cellular or wifi coverage.

Description: Online marketplace for dog professionals
Full Description: Zooza is an online marketplace that connects professional dog owners with clubs and events around the world.  Zooza targets dog clubs and independent event secretaries to help them create landing pages on the Zooza website about their events. Then, participants can enter the event online through the Zooza website, including paying fees. The Zooza platform handles out-bound promotion of events posted, provides a workflow engine for processing entrants, and manages the flow of money between participants and the organizer. Zooza is a SaaS product that reaches an important niche in the $50 billion pet industry. Dog owners who participate in events with their animals have the highest spend of any other segment in the industry across all categories including pet supplies, veterinary care, travel, boarding, and more.

Description: Zenergo is a social site allowing users to discover, connect and share with others around their favorite activities and interests.
Full Description: Zenergo is a new social site designed to Activate Your Life with easy, yet powerful tools allowing you to discover, connect and share with people and groups around your favorite activities and interests. Zenergo combines the functionality of email, photo sharing, event creation, group management, location and criteria-based search and calendaring in a single, safe, free and easy-to-use system, eliminating the need for many other website services. Most social networks take a â€œsingle bucketâ€ approach, meaning all contacts are considered to be in the same social circle, with the same social status to the primary networker. Other social networking sites only provide a single aspect of networking such as single group management or single event management. Zenergoâ€™s unique design and individual features provides a whole solution, thatâ€™s completely integrated The core technology, in development for over 2 years, is based on detailed, individual activity profiling, creating social resumes that map to real life and providing a more meaningful social networking experience.  Zenergo also offers a location-based and criteria matching service so users can expand their social network with new like-minded people.  Because Zenergo is activity-based, users will self-select themselves into their favorite interests (over 300 consumer verticals) initially allowing us to laser target marketing programs on a contextually relevant basis for national brands, local merchants and service providers. Zenergoâ€™s target demographic is the underserved post-college and above market, which is the fastest growing social networking audience both in the U.S. and globally.

Full Description: ZaCo was founded in February, 2015 when our flagship company, Ludus, began accelerating in growth. Ludus started as a side project for a high school theatre in Michigan and eventually developed into a product any performing arts program could use for free. The mission was simple: create a new ticket sales company that was focused solely on school performing arts programs and wasn't outdated like the competition. Ludus is now used by over 100 performing arts programs and has processed over a $1,000,000 in ticket sales.  ZaCo has also been involved with building Easy Reach Solutions, a new company with the focus on managing event facilities, work orders, and PR. Easy Reach offers easy-to-use web-based software with an advanced backend that resolves scheduling conflicts and makes life easier for everyone involved. Overall, we believe music, theatre, dance, and any other form of live art that brings people together is extremely powerful. Therefore, ZaCo's mission is to bring new ideas to life for the world of performing arts and live events.

Industries: Concerts, Digital Entertainment, Enterprise Software, Events, Media and Entertainment, Mobile, Social Media, Ticketing
Industry Groups: Events, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Mobile, Software
Description: Ticketmaster is the world’s largest ticket marketplace and the global market leader in live event ticketing.
Full Description: Ticketmaster is the world’s largest ticket marketplace and the global market leader in live event ticketing products and services. Ticketmaster is the official ticketing partner of the NHL, NFL, NBA, USTA, PGA Tours, a number of MLB and MLS teams, and artists and venues around the world. The company currently operates in 29 countries and processes more than 500 million ticket transactions each year through various platforms, including their app and website. Ticketmaster was founded in 1976 and went public in 1996 with a market value of $2.8 billion. In 2010, Ticketmaster merged with Live Nation to form Live Nation Entertainment, becoming the global leader in live entertainment. Ticketmaster has been an industry leader in technology advances for live entertainment and ticket sales. In 1995, it premiered its website, www.ticketmaster.com, and became one of the first companies to sell tickets over the internet. Their ticketing platform now supports some of the most sought after performances in the world, including Taylor Swift and Ed Sheeran. The partnership between Ticketmaster and Live Nation has allowed both companies to invest in new programs and technology to help address some of the top concerns in the event industry, including ticket bots. Ticketmaster is the leader in combatting bots and has created the Verified Fan program, which requires consumers to input information into the system. Consumers are then contacted with a time that they can purchase verified tickets. In 2017, Ticketmaster launched Presence, a next generation digital engagement and venue access software technology that enables digital ticketing. Presence allows ticket holders to turn their mobile device into an admission ticket, either through the Ticketmaster app or by using Apple wallet. Presence is rolling out at scale. In 2019, Ticketmaster launched SafeTix, an enhancement to Presence, which adds Anti-Counterfeiting Features to Tickets and Provides Event Owners Greater Visibility Into Event Attendees Ticketmaster has acquired several businesses throughout its history, including Ticketron, a digital ticket agency; TicketWeb Inc, an online ticket vendor for clubs and venues; Front Gate Tickets, a music festival ticketing technology; Strobe Labs, a music marketing platform; TicketHour, a sports ticketing operator; Universe, a DIY ticketing platform; and UPGRADED, a blockchain technology company. It also invested in Blink Identity, a facial recognition company.

ThunderTix is offered as an ongoing software as a service to venues who use it to sell tickets for their events. What makes ThunderTix unique in the industry is that NO per-ticket fees or order (processing) fees are added to any ticket. We have no contract so venues can sign up on a monthly license. Industries: Events, Social Network, Video Conferencing
Industry Groups: Events, Hardware, Information Technology, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Messaging and Telecommunications, Software
Description: TappedIn offers a platform that enables people to connect with the right people during events and conferences.
Full Description: TappedIn connects people so they can energize each other to achieve the growth we all want in our lives. It uses Human Energy to shift social actions. As technology advances and the digitization of our lives evolves, the need for face-to-face interaction and human-to-human connection continues to grow. Thousands of people attend hundreds of events each year in an attempt to be "connected" but are they really building meaningful relationships? The answer is no! Attending an event that results in zero conversations worth remembering turns out to be a waste of time, effort and money. What if people knew who they would meet at the event in advance, what they would talk about, and were actually prepared for every conversation they would have? TappedIn bridges the world of digital and in-person networking to help people create meaningful relationships that last a lifetime. In the future we plan to build in tools that will enable people to track follow through, manage relationships, and be focused on meeting the right people. So how does it work? Each attendee is matched with other attendees based on individual values and goals. 2 days before the event, they each get a list of people to meet and connect with. This way each attendee arrives at the event with a strong motivation to meet the 4-5 people they are perfectly matched with. Our Why-to-Why matching algorithm deciphers users' core beliefs and matches them with people that complement those core beliefs.

Description: Stolik offers mobile applications for restaurant reservation automation, restaurant discovery and relationship management with guests.
Full Description: Stolik is developing mobile applications for restaurant reservations and relationship management. We offer restaurants Stolik Pro - an intuitive and easy-to-use mobile manager app that automates the reservation process. In addition to that, we let restaurants build relationship and engage with their guests through a free Stolik User App that makes restaurant discovery and table reservation effortless, quick and available round-the-clock. In addition, with Stolik User App restaurants get a dedicated content distribution channel for communicating their deals and special events to their guests. The apps are already running in a beta testing mode with popular restaurants in Tashkent. We are launching both apps on AppStore and GooglePlay this month - February 2016.   By the end of 2018 in CIS alone we plan to have 9500 restaurants on Stolik Pro and sign up 1,8mln users on Stolik User app. With a flat $30 monthly fee that we charge every restaurant, we hope to be earning $3,4 mln annual revenue in 2019. Our mission is to become the category leader for mobile table reservations in markets where big global players like OpenTable (owned by Priceline), SeatMe (owned by Yelp), TheFork (owned by TripAdvisor) and Zomato are not dominating yet. We  counted more than 150 countries where no app is dominating yet.  What we are doing is unprecedented in the region and the automation features that we developed are just the beginning. We’re fundamentally changing the way restaurants engage with their clients and we would love to tell more about it at the GES 2016.

Description: SignalWire is a developer-driven Software-Defined Telecom infrastructure that runs in a distributed global network in the cloud.
Full Description: SignalWire is the next stage in the evolution of Software-Defined Telecom started in 2005 with the FreeSWITCH open-source project. The primary goal is to create a world-wide network that can transport real-time communications over secure standards-based channels and make it all accessible to developers and businesses using simple SDKs and programming interfaces designed to be powerful but simple-to-use. Audio/Video applications can be built with SignalWire that run in the mobile browser with no additional software and allow an experience that can unlock communications with a virtual office, AI bots, PSTN termination, gateways to remote call centers and much more.  With the evolving mobile SDK, rich applications can be built as native apps and the other side of every call is not just a "room" but a full-fledged routable telecommunications backend with additional programmable control for every call. SignalWire is founded on the principle of work-from-anywhere dating back to the turn of the century and continues that tradition with a fully distributed workforce spanning 16 US states and 11 countries in nearly every inhabited time zone. This remote culture has helped to shape the way our products and services have evolved and have proved to be invaluable amid the pandemic crisis in 2020. The core of SignalWire is made up of several networked nodes transforming the computing power of its host system into IP-based telecommunications relays that are demand-driven and horizontally scalable. The breadth of the SignalWire technology ranges from mature interfaces like SIP and PSTN to the state-of-the-art techniques in live video and HD audio. Unlike many "video chat" products and services, SignalWire goes well beyond basic capabilities and has dissected every moving part into programmable components that are on the bleeding edge of what is possible. SignalWire is evolving quickly into the first and only software-powered global telecommunications company delivering that as a service at the Infrastructure, Platform, and Application layer of today's communication stack landscape. Additionally, SignalWire is an active participant in the development and furthering of the standards on which the Internet relies for all of its real-time communications techniques.  SignalWire Call Fabric: The SignalWire cloud infrastructure that unites communications via API and Call-Routing logic.

Description: The city guide of instantaneous events
Full Description: Shout is a mobile application for iPhone and Android, which allows users to discover and/or promote public events. Anyone can share a local event in a couple of seconds by writing a short message and posting a picture along with it. This is what we call shouting. It appears on a map at this precise location for 4 hours. A happy hour just started in this bar, a music band is playing on your street corner, a garage sale is taking place two blocks away from here... Shout transforms your current whereabouts into a world of new opportunities.

Description: Sabre Corporation is a U.S.-based travel technology company providing software solutions to the travel industry.
Full Description: Founded in 1960, Sabre is a technology solutions provider to the global travel and tourism industry. It offers a broad range of technology solutions including, data-driven business intelligence, mobile, distribution and Software-as-a-Service solutions which are used by travel suppliers (airlines, hotels, car rental outlets, railways, cruise lines and tour operators) and travel buyers (travel agencies, travel management companies and corporate travel departments) to plan, market, sell, serve and operate their business.  In 2013, Sabre’s technology processed over $100 billion of estimated travel spending and more than 1.1 trillion system messages. Headquartered in Southlake, Texas, USA, Sabre has a presence in approximately 60 countries around the world. We serve our customers through cutting-edge technology developed in six facilities located across four continents. Sabre is privately owned by TPG and Silver Lake Partners.  The company operates three businesses: Sabre Airline Solutions, Sabre Hospitality Solutions and Sabre Travel Network.  The first passenger reservations system offered by Sabre, installed in 1960, marked a dramatic leap forward for the airline industry, automating one of its key business areas. In the following years, Sabre Airline Solutions® pioneered technological advances in areas such as revenue management, pricing, flight scheduling, cargo, flight operations and crew scheduling. Sabre helped invent electronic commerce for the travel industry, they hold claim to progressive solutions that defined — and continue to modernize — the travel and transportation marketplace.

Description: With Rooms2night you can find the best hotel deals from Argentina to Colombia and up to Mexico.
Full Description: Looking for funding! Latin and Central America are still unknown entities when it comes to conventional travel. Most travelers still think that countries in Central and Latin America are very dangerous and unsafe. Using legacy booking engines such as booking.com or expedia,com, travelers will get a list of hotels in broad geographic areas that they are interested in. Reviews and ratings from peers that have traveled to specific countries in that region are not available on those sites. Rooms2Night has gathered data and very valuable information from travelers who have gone to those regions and have enjoyed their trips tremendously and with no harm. This data is critical to attracting users to our App as travelers want to know about positive experiences about hotels and the non-traditional travel destinations. Rooms2night is a Miami based company that is at the heart of the travel to Central and Latin America. It gives travelers the feeling of security and peace of mind when traveling to an unknown destination as we provide feedback from other travelers, photos and recommendations from fellow travelers to Latin and Central America. Legacy booking engines such as hostelworld and booking.com work very well in safe destinations for travelers such as the US or Europe. Millenial travelers are all about authentic experiences. They don't go to a restaurant anymore just because the food is good. They go because if offers them an experience. Rooms2Night offers that type of experience and most importantly the connectivity to other travelers and the "sharing" experience when planning their travels.

Description: Ragnar is the overnight running relay race.
Full Description: At Ragnar, they strive to make life more awesome. That may sound like a lofty goal, but it starts simply. They believe in better health, lasting relationships and an enormous amount of fun. Americans average 7 hours + of screen time and 4 minutes outdoors a day. They exist to break that cycle and rebuild individuals’ connections with their mind and body, with nature and with other like-minded people. Ragnar is changing relationships, communities, participant health and wellness, and the world of endurance sports. In the Ragnar Relay Series, teams of 12 run a 200-mile relay over two days and one night; in the Ragnar Trail Series, teams of 8 run a 120-mile trail relay over the same time span. Often called a slumber party without sleep, pillows or deodorant, this unique relay turns out crazy costumes, inside jokes, close quarters and unforgettable stories.

Description: QLess is a platform that provides mobile, remote and interactive queueing; analytics; real-time CRM; and marketing.
Full Description: QLess is the world's first Mobile, Remote and Interactive Queueing, FlexAppointments, Analytics, Real-Time CRM & Marketing platform. QLess sends voice calls and text messages to your customers' cell phones, so they're free to roam as far as their cell coverage will take them. QLess also lets customers opt-in to SMS promotions from the merchant, and lets merchants easily build an SMS marketing channel. QLess is an award-winning wireless solution that has saved more than ten million users from more than 250 straight years standing in line at DMVs, restaurants, retail stores for Fortune 100 companies, shopping malls, doctors' offices, colleges and hundreds of other locations across four continents, as featured in The New York Times, WSJ, TechCrunch, CNET, Mashable, Fortune, PCWorld, NBC, ABC, Fox and many other leading news outlets.  QLess was the winner of six 2013 International Business Awards including: IT Executive of the Year, Innovator of the Year, Company of the Year – Computer Services, Most Innovative Company of the Year in Canada and the US, Company of the Year – Computer Software, and Executive of the Year – Computer Software, the Best Overall Business Services Company of the Year Under 100 Employees by the American Business Awards in 2010, named one of the Best Business Innovations of the year by the 2009 American Business Awards, one of the ten most promising new technology companies by Vator & The Funded.  QLess partners include BT, Alcatel Lucent and Telefonica, and clients include Vodafone, the states of TX, MI, KS, the Universities of CA & TX, the largest community college districts in the nation, Cleveland Clinic and many others.  Investors include the California Institute of Technology (Caltech) and successful entrepreneurs.

Description: Qgiv offers online and mobile fundraising options that help nonprofits raise more and change the world.
Full Description: Qgiv exists to help nonprofit and faith-based organizations raise more money with a comprehensive suite of fundraising tools featuring customizable donation forms, event registration, peer-to-peer fundraising, text giving with outbound messaging, and app-based auctions. We believe that outstanding causes deserve outstanding software designed with your unique needs in mind. Unlimited users with unlimited access to tools and support, no long-term contracts (and no sneaky fees!), and integrations with leading CRM and email tools make it easy for nonprofits to experiment with new technology and grow their digital fundraising programs. We’re committed to helping nonprofits raise more by anticipating and addressing their needs and challenges through customer-led development and close attention to industry best practices. From our headquarters in Lakeland, Florida, we currently serve more than 5,000 organizations in the United States and Canada. We pride ourselves on working closely with nonprofits, and we exist to help them succeed, celebrate their victories, and offer personal, one-on-one customer service.  Getting started is free and easy! Thousands of nonprofits have raised over $2 billion dollars through Qgiv so far -- you can join them! To learn more, visit www.qgiv.com.

Description: PurpleTrail organizes events and produces customized invitations.
Full Description: Seattle based PurpleTrail is an event organizer that lets you create, invite and evolve plans along with your friends, colleagues and family.  Features Include: - Easy address book import with duplicate detection - All event details on one page - Comprehensive invite management & status tracking - Always stay connected using your mobile phone - Recurring events & reminders - Share event photos from one place - Easy updates on your desktop widget - Rich post event experience including thank you notes PurpleTrail is also available on platforms other than the web. If you are the kind of person who enjoys a slick product on your PC, you are sure to enjoy the PurpleTrail Desktop Application that gives you access to all the great features of PurpleTrail without having to be glued to your browser. Much like the web interface, you are notified of all the viewpoints and discussions that happen in your event as they unfold in real time. It is also available for your mobile device as both a standalone application in Symbian OS (a J2ME client is coming soon) as well as on your mobile web browser. The mobile browser interface makes efficient use of the limited space and capability of the browser to give you all the important information regarding your event in just a few screens. The standalone application keeps you informed about your event with instant notifications when you receive chat messages or updates.  Furthermore, the site also has a section called PartyTrail  dedicated to party ideas & games. The section is complete with party ideas and neatly categorized and ordered by holidays and occasions. If you thought you weren't impulsive, think again, because after reading an article or two you might just end up throwing a party!

Description: Punchbowl is a web-based software platform that offers party planning services, customized digital invitations, and greeting cards.
Full Description: Punchbowl is a web-based software platform that offers party planning services, customized digital invitations, and greeting cards. The platform guides a host through all of the steps of planning a party and solves common problems along the way. Its party planning features include customizable digital invitations, potluck organization, gift registries, local vendor search, RSVP management, party supplies, photo and video sharing, and much more. Punchbowl has made setting a date much easier through the help of an algorithm that recommends the best date for its clients’ party. Invitees are sent a "Date Decider" email through its platform, allowing them to select the best date from a set of dates supplied by the host. Punchbowl also allows clients to set up message boards and integrate Google Maps’ to display the location. After the party’s over, Punchbowl lets clients create an after-party message board where attendees can share comments, photos, and videos.

Description: Fun & Collaborative Social Planning
Full Description: Planrly is a simple application to create and share social plans with your Facebook friends. You can easily create private or public plans, send instant invites and receive updates via push notifications. ## Salient Features ## Easy Private or Public Plan Creation: Planrly lets you create private (invite only) or public plans, send single tap invites and receive status notifications. Plans can have real physical address such as ‘1918 8th AVE Seattle’ or virtual addresses such as Doug’s Home, Online Shopping Center etc. Intuitive Organization: Planrly facilitates organization and easy navigation by monthly views, separated by three distinct tabs for Private, Friends and Public plans. Furthermore Planrly always keeps your past plans, letting you go back and forth in time and cherish old memories. Voting, Comments, Images & Signups: Planrly lets you and your invited friends post comments, add pictures, initiate votes and list signup items, all aesthetically integrated in a single plan view. Moreover all the added data is automatically shared amongst the invited guests, eliminating the need for separate requests for sharing images, comments and other memorable data.

Description: Online Business Management Software
Full Description: Planning Pod is online project and business management software for small businesses. In 2006, founders Jeff Kear and Steven Feingertz were looking for a single piece of Web-based software that would allow them to manage multiple aspects of their marketing business. Unable to find it, they decided to build it, and finally released this software in March 2012. This Web-based application is like a Swiss Army knife for running a small business, pulling together a number of tools into one application to make it more convenient for entrepreneurs to be more efficient and productive. The tools inside of Planning Pod let business owners manage projects, calendars, tasks, checklists, files, documents, image galleries, contacts, proposals/estimates, invoices, contracts, time tracking, communications and more. Users can customize their Planning Pod account by uploading custom backgrounds, logos and even changing the fonts. They can also plug into other popular applications such as Google and Facebook, importing calendars and contacts from these apps.

Description: We offer closed loop payments, distributed on public and private blockchain. We use AI to prevent fraud. Oveit can be deployed on minutes.
Full Description: The problem: There is no easy and reliable way to set up closed loop economies and payments. Closed loop economies can empower ecosystems, from festivals, to venues, to smart cities. However, setting this type of systems has been historically expensive and hard to implement, given the cost of hardware, security concerns.  As globalization extends, a new way of empowering local economies needs to be used. We think we can do this with our closed loop payments system, which is based on a combination of private and public blockchain and uses machine learning algorithms for fraud detection and prevention. From a consumer point of view a local closed loop economy can now be easily set up by just starting an account online and downloading a mobile app. Our solution: Oveit provides a closed loop payments solution for businesses, events or local governments. With Oveit they can easily become a local payment processor, getting access to local payment processing, decreasing costs, improving revenue and gaining data insights. We use a combination of private and public blockchain, in order to secure and distribute data. On demand, we allow customers to access their data. They can see how funds are used and how they interact with to the ecosystem's vendors, marketing sponsors and more.

Description: The OPC Foundation is dedicated to ensuring interoperability in automation.
Full Description: OPC is the interoperability standard for the secure and reliable exchange of data in the industrial automation space and in other industries. It is platform independent and ensures the seamless flow of information among devices from multiple vendors. The OPC Foundation is responsible for the development and maintenance of this standard. The OPC standard is a series of specifications developed by industry vendors, end-users and software developers. These specifications define the interface between Clients and Servers, as well as Servers and Servers, including access to real-time data, monitoring of alarms and events, access to historical data and other applications. When the standard was first released in 1996, its purpose was to abstract PLC specific protocols (such as Modbus, Profibus, etc.) into a standardized interface allowing HMI/SCADA systems to interface with a “middle-man” who would convert generic-OPC read/write requests into device-specific requests and vice-versa. As a result, an entire cottage industry of products emerged allowing end-users to implement systems using best-of-breed products all seamlessly interacting via OPC.

Description: Only A Date is an online dating website that enables its users to create dates that can be advertised on their profile.
Full Description: OnlyADate.com is an innovative dating website that revolutionizes online dating by 1) eliminating online communication between members 2) maintaining member confidentiality by allowing individuals to determine who sees their profile 3) integrating online restaurant reservations to streamline the date scheduling process and 4) eradicating monthly subscription fees.  Members can both “create a date” at the restaurant of their choice to be advertised along with their profile on the site or confidentially “show interest” in existing dates, where their profile will be visible only to the date host.   The problems this business is addressing are the following: Efficiency: Traditional online dating websites require an average investment of 10 hours online to meet someone offline. Our innovative approach streamlines this process from mate to date to a mere 10 minutes. Additionally, by allowing the member to preselect the day, time, restaurant and eventually the individual with whom he/she will meet, the process is mutually beneficial and convenient for both parties as the reservation is made automatically and all members have to do is show up and meet. Confidentiality: All profiles are private by default and dates can be scheduled without exchanging any private information. Additionally, these confidentiality measures prevent individuals from wasting time scanning hundreds of profiles on subscription based websites where 90% of profiles are “inactive” meaning not paying for a monthly subscription and thus unable to communicate online with other members. Our solution to this problem is that only active “dates” and their associated profiles are visible. Therefore members are only able to preview the profiles of those individuals offering dates or, as the host of a date, preview the profiles belonging to the individuals who are interested in their date.

Full Description: O’Reilly’s mission is to change the world by sharing the knowledge of innovators. For over 40 years, we’ve inspired companies and individuals to do new things—and do things better—by providing them with the skills and understanding that’s necessary for success. At the heart of our business is a unique network of experts and innovators who share their knowledge through us. Our online learning platform offers exclusive live training, books, and videos, making it easier for our customers to develop the expertise they need to get ahead. Our books have been heralded for decades as the definitive place to learn about the technologies that are shaping the future. And our conferences, held throughout the year, serve as dynamic meeting places for professionals from a variety of fields to make connections, discuss best practices, and discover emerging trends that will shape the future of the tech industry. Our customers are hungry to build the innovations that propel the world forward. And we help you do just that.

Description: Social Memorial Experience
Full Description: nfinitu.de is a concept in development for a web and app based service which provides users with a free platform to preserve the memories and life of departed family, friends and pets. The simple service will allow an individual to customize a page for another person or pet and through sharing with others and facebook page integration, allow others to be included in the memories. The concept is clean and simple and allows a facebook page to continue to exist and be automatically updated with thoughts, messages and photos via the nfinitu.de interface. All grieving, mourning and shared messages will be available for posting and sharing via iOS and android platforms. Important dates and life events of people and pets will be captured and imortalized via nfinitu.de for prosperity. Other family members and friends will be invited to join and be able to post, share and remember along with the page creator. Donations to world causes as it relates to the persons passing will be available along with insirational thoughts and weekly professional grieving posts. The concept of writing private messages will be able to be sent to the departed along with daily journaling and the ability to save them.

Description: Personal information storage and sharing
Full Description: Award-winning my4oneone enables people to store, access and share a wide range of personal information online in one secure location via the cloud. In a single, user-friendly platform, the site offers an easy way to save, share and comment on a wide range of both fun and vital information, including functions unique to my4oneone, without having to jump between multiple websites. That information is then accessible anywhere via computer, tablet or smartphone.  When fully deployed, my4oneone users will be able to share personal information, wish lists, calendars, recommended service providers, entertainment ratings, medical information, activity tracking and more with friends, family, professional associates and other contacts.  Users have control over who sees their information and can reserve specified data for their own personal use.  Access settings include "Private" for the user’s access only, "Privileged" for selected close family or friends, "Personal" for friends a wider set of contacts, and "Public" for any member of my4oneone. iPhone, iPad and Android apps are also planned.

Full Description: My Wedding Concierge is a newly formed enterprise focused on the combination of a search engine for the wedding industry and the emerging market of mobile wedding marketing while leveraging the proven marketing impact of social media tools.   The current products focus on features that are complementary to existing wedding planning websites.  The My Wedding Concierge wedding search engine and iPhone app empower todayâ€™s busy bride with power to quickly find wedding answers, whether she be surfing from the comfort of her home or on her mobile smart-phone between client meetings.  The goal is to provide brides with a wedding search experience that will allow them to quickly identify and manage important wedding answers for their wedding day.  Whether these answers be a vendorâ€™s expert opinion, a collection of blog articles, other bridal reviews, or personal photographs, the goal is to help brides find, organize, and share their findings in a fun social facebook-like environment.  The social community is designed to encourage wedding professionals to build relationships within the bridal community.  The more resources vendors provide, the greater benefit they will provide to brides and themselves.   My Wedding Concierge's system is designed to provide brides the most relevant content for their searches â€“ the more content a vendor provides, the better chance they will be found by brides.  Vendors build credibility, trust, and a relationship by helping brides solve their wedding problems.   The hope is this connection between brides and vendor breaks down the walls that might otherwise prevent brides from initiating the first contact with the vendor.

Industries: Billing, Crowdfunding, Events, Non Profit
Industry Groups: Events, Financial Services, Media and Entertainment, Other, Payments, Software
Description: Move Your Mountain is a crowdfunding platform enabling people to raise money for anything: start-ups, medical bills, non-profits, etc.
Full Description: Founded in 2013 and located in Reno, NV, Move Your Mountain is a crowdfunding community dedicated to providing a positive platform to meet all your fundraising needs. Utilizing a team of enthusiastic and dedicated experts, we are committed to the success of your online fundraising efforts. Anyone can start a fundraising campaign with Move Your Mountain: Individuals Groups Teams Politicians Start ups Non-profits Start a campaign, set a goal, and share with your contacts. Our website has been developed with you in mind. We’ve secured your payment processing, made the webpages easy to navigate, and made it a one-click process to share your campaign on all social media channels. Moving Your Mountain has never been easier. There are many features that set us apart from the other crowdfunding platforms, a few of which are: Branded Pages—Your group, organization, or business can let go of your traditional website with our all inclusive “branded page”. These pages include all the details about your campaign and can even include multiple campaigns running at the same time. Our branded pages are backed by our secured network and technical team. Text Updates—You can update your campaign while “on the go” with our easy to use texting update feature. Upload photos, videos, or just give everyone an update of what’s happening at an event. Movers—We love groups and teams working together, that’s why we’ve developed a great feature in your branded page! You can have multiple people working for your cause and all donations will go to your main campaign. These movers will be raising funds in support of your cause and increasing the reach potential of your campaign. Flat fee—We don’t want any questions about what fee you’ll pay to fundraise on our platform…so, we’ve made it as easy as possible. 4% flat fee plus transaction fee (of 2.9%). If you don’t reach your goal…you get all your money…and you get it all at only 4% plus transaction fee. We don’t penalize you for not reaching your goal. Ongoing Campaigns—MoveYourMountain.org offers ongoing campaigns, where donors can opt to donate a fixed amount monthly vs. a set one time donation. For campaigns that are ongoing, this is a great value added service provided. We think you’re going to love what we can offer you!

Description: MLconf gathers communities to discuss research and application of algorithms, tools, and platforms.
Full Description: The Machine Learning Conference (MLconf) began in 2012, as a partnership with Carnegie Mellon University’s GraphLab team, to gather the thought leaders in Machine Learning, specifically Graph Databases.. In 2013, MLconf became a separate event, devoted to the Machine Learning and Data Science community in San Francisco, agnostic of any tool, platform or company. MLconf events host speakers from various industries, research and universities to discuss recent research and application of Machine Learning methodologies and practices. Since 2014, MLconf has hosted events in several US cities and has aimed to host gender balanced rosters of presenters from experts in Machine Learning, Data Science and AI.

Description: Mazey is a communication and collaboration platform designed for groups that straddle “desk-bound” and “desk-less” worlds.
Full Description: Mazey is taking advantage of the rising wave of smartphone-wielding deskless workers. Thanks to ubiquitous wireless broadband, employees who previously were not issued a company email address, let alone a computer, are now expected to communicate with coworkers and management anytime, anywhere. For small and medium-sized organizations, Mazey replaces email, group texting, and group chat with a single, intuitive tool with a richer feature set. It eliminates the need for separate communication, file sharing and task tracking solutions that often fail to bridge the desktop-mobile worlds effectively. Mazey enables compartmentalized, asynchronous conversations that take place in context of documents and artifacts being discussed. This solves perennial challenges related to document management, version control and fragmentary knowledge capture, and ultimately improves knowledge management, accelerates knowledge retrieval and increases organizational productivity. Lastly, Mazey features a highly extensible “shared notebook” construct that can be tailored to accommodate any type of structured content that might be needed by teams to collect or retrieve data (e.g. polls and surveys, procedural checklists, time sheets, shift schedules, work orders, etc.). This flexibility ensures Mazey’s relevance across any number of specialized verticals.

Description: Madeit.com is a full service infrastructure as a Service Provider. Offers Cloud and Virtual Hosting Services.
Full Description: [MadeIt.com](http://madeit.com) now provides online event registration services. Like Ticketmaster serves large events, concerts etc, MadeIt.com provides a self-service ticketing platform to make it easier to sellout your small to medium sized events. How do we do this? MadeIt allows event organizers to: 1. Publish a customized event web page online 2. Promote your event using our online promotion tools 3. Easily sell and collect ticket revenue online The service works well for events like: - Workshops - Seminars - Tradeshows - Sporting events - Fundraisers  MadeIt.com's previous service: MadeIt.com, a social event planning application, has plans to displace Evite as the internet's most popular invite service.  Madeit brings to the table more customizable invitations as well as a social layer which evite currently lacks.   MadeIt's invites can have embedded video clips, photos, custom backgrounds, discussion areas and a place for general information of course.  Invites can be made from scratch or built up from a variety of pre-made templates.    The social layer comes in After events have passed.  MadeIt changes all events from invitation pages to "aftermath" pages where party goers can write comments and post pictures, videos and other media from the event.  The page becomes a mini-social network focused on a single event.  Unlike most social networks, MadeIt focuses on helping you meet new friends and then stay in touch by immediately bringing everyone back together online.   The company competes directly with [Socializr](http://crunchbase.com/organization/socializr) (from the founder of [Friendster](http://crunchbase.com/organization/friendster)), Evite, Mypunchbowl, SuggestLocal, Skobee and Renkoo.

Description: LogRhythm is a NextGen SIEM Platform combining advanced security analytics, UEBA, NDR, and SOAR in a single end-to-end solution.
Full Description: LogRhythm is a world leader in NextGen SIEM, empowering thousands of enterprises on six continents to successfully reduce cyber and operational risk by rapidly detecting, responding to, and neutralizing damaging cyberthreats. The LogRhythm NextGen SIEM Platform combines advanced security analytics; user and entity behavior analytics (UEBA); network detection and response (NDR); and security orchestration, automation, and response (SOAR) in a single end-to-end solution. LogRhythm’s technology serves as the foundation for the world’s most modern enterprise security operations centers (SOCs), helping customers measurably secure their cloud, physical, and virtual infrastructures for both IT and OT environments. Built for security professionals by security professionals, the LogRhythm NextGen SIEM Platform has won a countless customer and industry accolades.

Description: LocalRaces is an event management platform that provides technology to create experiences and make event management profitable.
Full Description: WE PROVIDE RACE DIRECTORS THE TECHNOLOGY TO CREATE EXPERIENCES PARTICIPANTS WILL LOVE AND TO MAKE EVENT MANAGEMENT EASIER AND MORE PROFITABLE. LocalRaces.com is more than online race registration and event management software in the $2 billion endurance event market.  Our technology creates a great event experience for runners, cyclists, and triathletes.  From driving new participants, to collecting data insights that result in better decisions, to offering timesaving automated processes that sets our clients apart from their competition, we make managing endurance events more efficient and profitable. The company acts as a payment facilitator for both race directors and managers of running and cycling clubs.  We process race participant, sponsor, and club member registrations, both online and onsite, utilizing our mobile credit card readers.  The company charges a $1.50 + 6% processing fee to registrants, while providing in-kind event management SaaS solutions to the race directors.  Our all-in-one web-based software suite includes registration, volunteer, sponsor, advertising, and vendor management solutions.   Athletes sign up for our clients’ events and clubs on LocalRaces.com, the nation’s largest network of local running and cycling communities, where we host thousands of event, club, and trail profiles in all 381 U.S. metropolitan areas.  We provide every registered athlete web-based tools and mobile applications to manage their upcoming race itineraries, past results, club memberships, personal records, goals, and training runs and rides.  The company generates additional revenues from our network of media properties via featured event paid listings, display ads, and from 3rd party offerings to our registered athlete database of highly affluent consumers in the $8 billion running shoe and apparel market. Our sites and mobile applications are powered by our proprietary LocalRaces API, which aggregates race event, trail, club, and athlete meta data supplied by athletes, race directors, other event engines, race result databases, and training applications like Strava and Garmin.  Opening our API to 3rd party web and mobile app development will generating additional registrations and ad revenues.

Industries: Events, SaaS, Social Media, Software
Industry Groups: Events, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Software
Description: Localist is a software company that users can use to market their events through an online calendar.
Full Description: OUR VISION  Every event, discoverable. Why? Humans are social animals. When they come together, a connection is created, which creates a stronger bond of tolerance and understanding. Scale that up, and we're living in a more tolerant and understanding society. OUR MISSION  Lower the barriers that prevent events from getting online. OUR PRODUCTS  Our core product is calendar marketing software that helps organizations publish, manage and promote upcoming events to their audience. Our native mobile app, Tailgate, helps audience members connect, engage and react with each other at events in real-time. The result of using our software is far-reaching. Our products reinforce the idea that events and event content are powerful ways to connect communities to organizations. Ultimately, we want every public event happening in the world to be online so people can discover them and connect with each other. If "connection" is the atom of the idea, what's a great way to connect people together at a large scale? Events! Bringing people together around a common cause or interest sparks thousands of these connections in a single moment. Our products facilitate that. WHAT IT'S LIKE TO WORK HERE  We are not the typical "work hard, play hard" company culture, (which just translates to long hours and heavy drinking). Instead, we focus on making everyone feel deeply rewarded by working on things that matter while actively encouraging healthy work-life balance.

Full Description: Why LocaleIQ LocaleIQ™ is a multi-tenant SaaS intelligent location management solution that enables customers to bring together valuable geographical, IoT/sensors and people to collaborate in a seamless environment with no expertise.  Providing smart cities, smart industry, smart building, venues, outdoor recreation and many other verticals with a solution that can unlock GIS data, IoT/sensor telemetry and people inputs to provide better information, operations and analytics for their organizations and their customers.  Customers can now easily manage maps, content, location-based projects, events, asset and inventory tracking along with real-time and scheduled updates to accessibility, closures, alerts and more.  Empowering the right people with the right tools to manage their location business whether it is a smart city, smart factory or recreation area. Innovation Businesses have been using multiple, old, complex technology solutions that required training and expertise to manage their location operations, thus restricting management of this data to a few, highly trained employees.  LocaleIQ’s SaaS platform offers a single solution, with map drawing tools and smart forms that any staff member can use whether in the office, or from the field to publish real-time location updates to their interactive digital maps and websites. Disruption We are creating a NEW SOLUTION CATEGORY that combines multiple solutions into a single, easy to use platform that opens the doors for any staff member to contribute to location-based information management and online publishing. By offering predictable, affordable pricing and a single, map agnostic solution we save our customers money, resources, and time and give them a way to reach their customers through interactive digital maps that they haven’t been able to do up until now! Our Expertise Nau Media’s team are proven leaders that have delivered best in class enterprise and SMB solutions and are domain experts in enterprise SaaS platforms and digital mapping.  We have met with hundreds of experts in the roles of GIS, digital mapping, government land management, and outdoor recreation related industries to ensure that we build a platform that meets our target customers’ digital mapping and media management needs with one integrated business solution.

To consumers, we offer a marketplace that delivers a highly personalized experience. To small retailers and businesses, we create the opportunity to transform their brick-and-mortar business into a digital store that is relevant to its customers. As opposed to pure e-commerce event, our platform enables magic to happen IRL (In Real Life). The result? When consumers and local businesses engage with each other in a dynamic environment, socio-economic benefits are created. This uplifts, revives and boosts the local community. When our communities thrive, everybody wins. Our version of OmniCommerce is driven by the engine of people power. We believe there is leverage in numbers. Our version of e-Commerce is driven by the engine of people power. We believe there is leverage in numbers.

Full Description: Our customers are independent consultants of the in-home party plan industry – a segment of the direct seller’s industry. The independent consultant is pretty much on their own to figure it out. Most new recruits aren’t wired to take on this level of “entrepreneurship”. Our product is a custom web-based, mobile optimized, software application that includes several modules to help them manage their contacts, tasks, parties, and business.  IzyTrack is unique in several ways. We’re a very customized software for a very specific niche market.   We’re the only fully integrated, customized product to this very specialized segment of the market that includes everything they need to operate their business. Once they use IzyTrack, they find it very painful to stay in business without it, because there is no other solution like it, at any price. Full Description: itzat is a fresh approach to the nightlife brought to you by Austin Social Innovation LLC.  itzat was developed to deliver an effective marketing tool for nightlife brands and businesses which:  1. Provides meaningful interaction with itzat customers 2. Produces real-time updates for a constantly evolving market 3. Tracks user data in relation to nightlife brands and business 4. News:  The itzat “News” section is a one-stop-shop for everything that is happening in any given city on any given night. These cards allow businesses to monetize and track the engagement of specific customers as well as securely validate card benefits and entry to events. itzat is backed by the experienced and talented media company NAKA Media and a strong list of influential and well connected advisers.  itzat's goal is to become the number one player in the nightlife social sphere and the go-to brand for businesses and consumers alike.

Description: Pogby is a web solution allowing users to search and see pricing of event venue packages.
Full Description: Pogby connects event planners and venues via the web.  Pogbyâ€™s proprietary venue booking engine, venue management tools and planned customized search components meets an untapped need within a multi-billion dollar industry.  Pogby.com will be the premier distribution channel for venues to list and market their availability effectively on line. Initial services enable event planners to view a venueâ€™s availability, configure an event package and book an event space directly from the venueâ€™s site or from a distribution partner site. The base service also offers venues the ability to manage their booking requests, manage their venue spaces and optimize their venue utilization via Pogbyâ€™s proprietary venue space management tools. Next release services will enable planners to search, find, compare and rate venues and will provide planners with proprietary tools to help them manage their events more efficiently. Today, the process of finding and booking a venue for an event is highly fragmented, highly manual and unsecure. Planners use multiple means (e.g., spreadsheets, calendar applications, phone, email, fax and in-person visits) to determine availability, reserve and book event space. Similarly, venue managers spend an enormous amount of time, through multiple, manual means , finalizing an event date, event package (menu, options, etc.) and meeting a clientâ€™s budget requirements  before their space is ever booked. In addition, venue managers do not have an integrated toolset to help them manage their venueâ€™s availability, to organize and respond to inquiries, distribute their product to a global audience, or to enable full transparency of the reservation and booking process in a secure environment. Pogby.com streamlines the fragmented event planning process to a convenient, easy to use, online-software service that results in: reduced time spent on compiling a proposal, increased productivity, and increased client customization for both the venue managers and the planners they support.

The platform is an online subscription based service creating recurring revenue with unlimited scale, with a custom enterprise solution provided to multi user clients. HelpGetSponsors.com is the only cloud based software designed to service the sponsorship sales processes for events and unlike full service sponsorship sales its utilities are affordable. Subscribers have access to automated tools that document/save prospective sponsor contact information (CRM), price event sponsorships, and create proposals, contracts and activation calendars (task lists). These tools work seamlessly together making the sales process more efficient and professional.

Description: Hagtap is a mobile application that helps users find local events
Full Description: Hagtap is a mobile and desktop application that provides its users with the ability to search and find events and venues located near them based on the factors that interest them the most.  Hagtap hosts a robust database filled with venues across the country that have been checked thoroughly for accuracy and existence. Each venue is classified based on what it offers, the ambiance, and type of music among many other factors. At first glance users are presented with events and venues that are popular and trending near them. Through the use of an advanced filter and search system users are able to locate the best nightlife destinations near them at any given moment.  The application is beneficial for both users and venue owners/promoters; venue owners and promoters will have a profile page that details metrics and reports information showcasing user engagement, participation, promotional use, and how often the venue is searched.  The application as a whole will be solving the age old problem of "what should we do tonight?" If you are looking for a club or lounge near you that plays Salsa music, you can either search for Salsa events or Salsa clubs. To find either, all it takes is a filtered search and you will be provided with a list of events/venues near your location.

Description: The Growth Hackers Conference brings together the top marketing minds from the Technology industry.
Full Description: The Growth Hackers Conference brings together the top marketing minds from the Technology industry. It was started by Gagan Biyani and Erin Turner; the first conference was in Palo Alto on October 2012. A series of new conferences will be announced in 2013. At consumer Internet companies big and small, the drive to find scalable and repeatable ways to gain customers is blurring the lines between marketing, product management, and engineering. We're seeing a new role emerge across Silicon Valley: the "growth hacker" and entire growth teams are combining quantitative direct marketing techniques, data modeling, relentless testing, and the harnessing of distribution existing networks. Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Airbnb are just a few companies who've grown to millions of users with this new breed of marketers leading the charge. Growth Hackers Conference is an event for technology entrepreneurs, marketers, developers, and investors to learn from the best growth hackers in Silicon Valley.   Guests hear from the best growth hackers in the business, including the founders of the growth teams at Facebook and Twitter, the co-founder and CTO of LivingSocial, the CEO of KISSMetrics and other leading thinkers and entrepreneurs. Our speakers will cover everything from how to make sure the right growth engine is embedded at the core of a product to how they've skyrocketed customer numbers once product-market fit is already working.   The first conference was hosted on Friday, October 26 at the Quadrus Conference Center in Menlo Park and attendees heard from speakers with track records of success in building businesses using growth hacking techniques.

Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Data and Analytics, Education, Events, Information Technology, Media and Entertainment, Other, Sales and Marketing, Software
Description: GreenRope® provides a user-friendly all-in-one solution to consolidate, simplify and automate your daily sales and marketing operations.
Full Description: GreenRope Complete CRM and marketing automation delivers a comprehensive solution to help your team do more with less. With sales, marketing and operations all built-in to the same system, you become a lean, data-driven organization. Increase collaboration, drive sales, build better relationships, and deliver optimized omnichannel customer experiences. The GreenRope platform was developed to help businesses consolidate their technology stack to help them become more productive, while also saving valuable resources like time and money. GreenRope, on average, saves users 90% in total cost of ownership when investing in a full-featured solution. With our robust feature offering, each of your departments can work effectively in the CRM while also having access to customer service, marketing, operations, and more.  Our pricing model is different from competitors in that we base our pricing on the number of contacts in your CRM, rather than the number of users. This means, you do not have to pay for every user to have their own login and password. Instead, each employee can have their own password and login with specific access permissions, all for the price of a single subscription cost. Our system is built on the concept that when the entire team works in the same software, as a business, you get full transparency into your efforts, business performance, team projects, the customer experience, and more. This model helps businesses save hundred to thousands of dollars each year. Your pricing is based on actual business growth, NOT the size of your team.  GreenRope's all-in-one CRM, marketing automation, and operations solution is built for businesses wanting to establish more effective business processes and deliver better customer experiences for optimal growth.  What are GreenRope’s main features?  CRM:  As a Complete CRM, we offer CRM as the foundation, housing all of your contacts and data. Along with a secure database, you have access to full pipeline visibility, contact research, CRM activities, workflows, sales opportunity management, quotas, reporting, click-to-call, mobile CRM, and much more. Each of these features ties directly into the contact record, so you have a 360-degree view of the contact and your relationship with that contact. You can then use all of this data to drive your marketing initiatives, as well as provide context for more productive sales and customer service calls. Our CRM is so robust, offering sales professionals, business owners, customer service reps, and marketing execs, access to the data they need to do their jobs effectively. GreenRope also offers a mobile app for on the go data management.  Marketing Automation:  Our marketing automation tools are incredibly powerful and help businesses bridge the gap between sales, marketing, and operations. Our drag-and-drop customer journey builder is your one-stop shop for creating seamless customer experiences. Use the email builder to create professional looking, mobile responsive emails, then test them out using our campaign optimizer. Automate specific actions when recipients open or click on your emails and send each down tailored customer paths. Our landing pages & signup forms make it easy to generate new leads and automatically add them to your CRM and any customer journeys. Plus, our A/B testing makes it simple to track performance from each of your campaigns.  Our automation viewer allows you to view all of the automation setup in your account, giving you the whole pictures, so you can actively see how client's move through your customer lifecycle.  Operations:  Just as important as sales and marketing is operations. GreenRope gives business owners full control over their entire business and this includes document signing, customer service, project management, learning management, event management and more. Our ticketing feature helps team manage customer service inquiries and other requests. You can automatically assign tickets to different people on your team based on rules, trigger automation, and activate reminders to make sure nothing slips through the cracks. GreenRoe's project management tool is a powerful way to track both internal and customer facing projects. Share updates with clients, track billable hours, set a timer, and more. Along with these two powerful features, GreenRope offers digital document signing, event management, and a learning management feature, all included with every GreenRope account. A list of all GreenRope features. Sales - Complete CRM - Workflows  - CRM activities & notes  - Contact management - Sales opportunity management - Database management tools - Reporting - Custom user-fields - Custom objects - Automatic contact research - Booking calendar - SMS/MMS marketing - Click-to-call  - eCommerce - Mobile app - Team calendaring - Affiliate marketing software - Digital document signing  - Lead scoring - Predictive analytics   Marketing - Marketing automation - Website builder - Email marketing - Customer journey mapping - Landing page builder - Social networking - Web analytics - Drag-and-drop email builder - Signup forms - Email tracking  - Workflow manager - Drip campaigns - Surveys - Video tracking - Mobile app - Email & landing page templates - Split (A/B testing) campaigns - SMS/MMS/Voice broadcast campaigns   Operations - Project management - Event management - Learning management system - Ticketing for customer service  - Contact management - Collaborative Wiki  - Command center - ESignature - Shared access  - Live chat integration - Phone tree management   Who does GreenRope integrate with?  While we integrate with a plethora of tools using Zapier & PieSync, we natively integrate with:  - Juvo Leads - Olark Live Chat  - Zapier - PieSync - PayPal - Authorize.net - BlueSnap - WordPress - GoToMeeting - Gmail & Google Analytics - SendForensics  - Postalyics  - FullContact  - e-Hawk - QuickBooks - Evernote - Outlook  What does GreenRope’s pricing model look like?  All packages come with unlimited users, unlimited emails, and all of the features. You also get a choice between our standard account setup package and our premium account package. Both are designed to help get our new users up and running quickly.  Our packages include:  - Starter > Up to 1000 contacts  - Prime  > Up to 3000 contacts  - Pro > Up to 5000 contacts - Premium > Up to 7500 contacts  - Powerhouse > Up to 10000 contacts  - Supreme > Up to 25000 contacts  - Ultimate > Up to 50000 contacts  **Custom packages available.

Description: Global Ground Automation, Inc., an independent rearden commerce company, develops technologies that automate and simplify the ground
Full Description: Global Ground Automation, Inc., an independent rearden commerce company, develops technologies that automate and simplify the ground transportation reservation process for corporations, travel managers, and car service providers. It offers Odyssey, a Windows-based back-office system for reservation, dispatch, accounting, and billing; GGA-Online, a set of Internet-based solutions for service providers that allow their corporate and retail clients to make reservations online; and TranspoNet, a reservation transmission technology interface that allows a ground transportation provider to electronically transmit and receive reservations. The company also offers Affiliate-Connect that allows providers to transmit reservations electronically using TranspoNet, an interactive and real-time reservation processing system designed for the ground transportation industry; and GT3 GDSConnect that allows travelers, travel agents, and corporate travel departments to book reservations for limousines, town cars, and other forms of ground transportation online. In addition, it offers managed reservation services Web services, dispatch control, audit and payment processing, and Web reporting services. Global Ground Automation, Inc. was formerly known as Ground Travel Technology Team, Inc. and changed its name in 2008. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Hackensack, New Jersey. As of September 22, 2008, Global Ground Automation, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Rearden Commerce, Inc.

Description: Glitnir Ticketing is a ticketing and CRM platform.
Full Description: Glitnir Ticketing was founded in late 2003 when the founders discovered a serious need for ticketing systems at the minor league baseball level. The company sold their first ticket on March 10, 2004 and since then has become a vendor for many baseball teams throughout the country - AAA, AA, A, Rookie, Independent, Collegiate Leagues. The company has also expanded beyond baseball and provides ticketing software & service for soccer, hockey, softball, racetracks, basketball, football, college athletics, theaters and multi-purpose venues throughout the United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom. Glitnir has also served as the primary ticket provider for many concerts, boxing matches, wrestling matches, rodeo, MMA fights, and other stand-alone events. In time, the value of the Glitnir System was recognized by MLBAM and was approved as an authorized ticketing vendor for its minor league baseball system. The Long Island Ducks, located in Glitnir’s backyard, processed more than 600,000 tickets in 2015.

Description: Gablit is a search site and events database that makes it easy for users to search and learn about events that are happening around them.
Full Description: Gablit.com enables people to find more of the things they love to do near them. From super-stealth beginnings in 2011, Gablit has grown its database and event classification techniques to ensure the information people look for and related events are displayed as easily digestible results that can be viewed in multiple formats. With 750 million crawls a year and over 8 million events in the database, Gablit has already outstripped much of the established competition in regards to event depth, search capability and user friendliness. Gablit also offers a unique data solution. Their events data is future-facing rather than analysis of past events patterns. By running the event data through complex social filters, Gablit can tell local businesses all over the world not only what events are on in their vicinity, but how many people will be attending. This hyper-local data can be applied globally to help inform promotional, stock and staffing decisions.

The general consensus is that recommendations from friends rule. The problem is, getting those recommendations from friends in the normal course of life (via text, chance encounters, or planned social events) is no small task. Description: FeedMagnet is a web application that enables brands to curate and display media content from social networks.
Full Description: FeedMagnet is a web application that helps brands curate and display social media from 14 social networks including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, Flickr, Foursquare, and more. It's technology implements custom website and event executions for Fortune 500 clients including: GE, Dow, Sephora, Sundance Channel, Warner Music Group, AOL, AMD, Logitech, Autonation, World Poker Tour, DraftFCB, RAPP, Radioshack and more FeedMagnet supports content from all major social networks including Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Instagram, Twitpic, yFrog, Flickr, Lockerz, Foursquare, Gowalla, Vimeo, Tumblr, Google Buzz, Delicious, and RSS. It also has an admin interface where clients can filter and moderate content. Filters automate the process of sifting through content to determine what makes it into the feeds. Customers can filter by keyword, users, content type, and sentiment. Customers can also manually moderate content. FeedMagnet can be set to where all content has to be approved before being displayed or automatically displayed with the ability to remove any post at any time. Customers have the choice to design displays in-house or FeedMagnet can do it for them. Designs can be made for all devices and screen sizes. Every Feedmagnet customer gets their own Rackspace Cloud system. As needs change, FeedMagnet can grow your cloud server in a matter of minutesâ€”even just bumping it up temporarily to handle a planned spike in traffic. Just add a few lines of JavaScript and you're up and running, pulling content from FeedMagnet right into your page. Data is transferred in a standard json format. Smart layouts and Google Maps integrations are built-in.

Description: Financial analytics software solutions
Full Description: Ez-XBRL Solutions, Inc. is a global provider of products and services for Financial Analytics and Financial Regulatory Compliance. Ez-XBRL Solutions’ team comprises of experts with significant knowledge and experience in a diverse set of domains and technologies, including financial services, XBRL documents, XML databases, Natural Language Processing and Analytics. The company’s senior management team has extensive experience in establishing organizations involved in creating software products and in providing outsourced services to companies worldwide.  The company is a member of XBRL US and is playing a key role in the development of XBRL standards and global adoption. The company is headquartered in the USA and has operations in the UK and India.  Products Ez-XBRL Solutions has a suite of products and services that combine to provide customers with a broad range of analytics and compliance solutions.  Analytics Our new analytics product – Contexxia – utilizes Natural Language Processing and Artificial Intelligence techniques to make SEC filings research fast and easy. It enhances the conventional ability to analyze financial statements (numerics) by providing unique views of textual changes in corporate regulatory filings and implicit events that can be predicted based on these filings. It leverages the underlying XBRL data to provide rich analytics of textual semantics and XBRL concepts. Contexxia has social network integration enabling users to bookmark and share fragments of information from SEC filings with their social networks. Contexxia is also designed to incorporate a wide variety of external data sources beyond regulatory filings to provide a complete Big Data analytics platform. Contexxia is is available at www.contexxia.com. Compliance Our flagship compliance product, Ez-XBRL, is a simple and efficient application that enables effortless creation of XBRL documents without requiring extensive training in XBRL. Ez-XBRL has been used to create XBRL filings for over 1,000 corporations in the USA and India and has been ranked as the #4 XBRL product in the USA. XOR is a very popular cloud-based SEC XBRL reviewing and reporting product that integrates collaboration, a powerful validation engine and advanced reporting capabilities. Managed Services Ez-XBRL Solutions provides a comprehensive set of XBRL Managed Services that seamlessly integrate with an organization’s existing processes for XBRL filings and external reporting. We achieve this through a combination of a highly-trained professional services team, a well-defined, tried and tested process, and a suite of technologies crafted specifically for XBRL creation and validation. Our Managed Services team has significant experience providing XBRL services to US SEC filers (Corporations and Mutual Funds), UK Corporation Tax filers and India MCA filers. We have been recognized and listed by UK HMRC as a managed tagging service provider. Our services ensure full compliance with all their standards and validation rules for both these regulators. Our services are further enhanced by a range of technologies to manage and streamline the process of service delivery.

Description: A global platform that supports accessible and inclusive events hosted by governments, schools, NGOs, and other businesses.
Full Description: Eventida supports accessible and inclusive events hosted by governments, schools and nonprofits by providing a platform that connects software apps, support services, and a resource center with guidelines, a marketplace, and learning solutions. PROBLEM: It is very difficult to ensure an event is fully accessible and inclusive. Governments, schools, NGOs and large corporations have a mandate to ensure their events are accessible and inclusive, both leading up to and at the event. It is very time consuming and costly, due to lack of resources, funding, data and education. Event hosts in all sectors and industries often fail this mandate, creating barriers to opportunity for underserved populations, such as persons with disabilities, food allergies, foreign language speakers, and more.  SOLUTION: A platform connecting software applications, support services and learning solutions. Eventida serves event professionals, venue managers, online event software, attendees who require accommodations, and their service providers. Users post & share events, manage & fulfill accommodation requests, promote collections of inclusive events, add resources and advertises to event hosts. Eventida offers premium features and support packages on a cost-effective subscription model, and works with partners on special projects.   SEEKING PARTNERS for our resource center, with guidelines and learning solutions, lists of software apps that are and are not accessible or inclusive, product and service information, useful for everyone in an event’s ecosystem: > team and volunteers > attendees and presenters > venue, catering or web platform managers > vendors who provide services or products to events
